bibl.title: Antoninus the κόρυφος (Note on P. Oxy. XLVI 3298.2).
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XLVI, 3298 (horoscope, later IIIrd cent. A.D.), 2: b β (ἔτους) Ἀντωνείνου τοῦ κορύφ(ου). It seems preferable to understand κόρυφος / κόροιφος as ὁ οἰφῶν τὰς κόρας rather than as ὁ ὡς κόρη οἰφώμενος. The description agrees with the known facts about the life of Elagabalus. The word κόρυφος occurs also in P. Tebt. II, 414, 7 (private letter, II cent. A.D.).
bibl.seg: LUKASZEWICZ Adam, Antoninus the κόρυφος (Note on P. Oxy. XLVI 3298.2).

It seems preferable to understand κόρυφος / κόροιφος as ὁ οἰφῶν τὰς κόρας rather than as ὁ ὡς κόρη οἰφώμενος. The description agrees with the known facts about the life of Elagabalus.
